    public class BlinkDetection.Options

    All options for the transformer

      Option<java.lang.Float> blinkThreshold
      Peak threshold for blink detection.

    • Field Detail

      • blinkThreshold

        public final Option<java.lang.Float> blinkThreshold
        Peak threshold for blink detection.
        A lower value will detect more alleged blinks.

      • varianceThreshold

        public final Option<java.lang.Float> varianceThreshold
        Variance between left and right value of the peak value.
        If the threshold is reached, the blink will not be counted, because it is assumed to be a false blink due to high movement.

      • countBlink

        public final Option<java.lang.Boolean> countBlink
        Count the blinks and return the additive result instead of giving a high signal when a blink occurs.
